XenotypeDef.label: vlka fenryka
XenotypeDef.description: Vlka Fenryka, also known as the Space Wolves, are a Legion of the Legiones Astartes. Their homeworld is the feral death world of Fenris, and they are known for their savage combat style and strong ties to their pre-Imperial culture.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Vlka Fenryka, also known as the Space Wolves, are a Legion of the Legiones Astartes.

XenotypeDef.label: tiskan
XenotypeDef.description: Tiskans, also known as the Thousand Sons, are a Legion of the Legiones Astartes. They are known for their exceptional psychic abilities and the use of sorcery.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Tiskans, also known as the Thousand Sons, are a Legion of the Legiones Astartes.
